title: FOR RENT - Premium 2 bd/2 bth 1,200sqft approx condo dwntwn Farmington
posting_body: FOR RENT - FULLY UPDATED 2 bed/2 bath condo just blocks from Downtown Farmington.
condo with covered parking, pool access, and walking distance to downtown Farmington.

Updated granite kitchen with new cabinets and energy efficient appliances, brand new carpet and flooring, updated bathrooms, crown molding throughout, updated lighting, master bath and adjustable walk-in closet in the master bedroom, laundry/storage room with custom shelving and washer/dryer, balcony-like 3 season room overlooking wooded area, easy access to 696, 96, 275, and M5.
Tenant pays for all other utilities, i.e. electricity, cable.
$1,580 Monthly rent – will consider rent reduction for multi-year lease.
Tenants will be screened through application process including criminal background (foreclosure is not a problem).
Large Utility Room with shelving and storage
Large Closets and Walk-in Closet in Master Suite
Newly Renovated Granite Kitchen – Tall cupboards, Breakfast Bar
New Carpet and Flooring in the Laundry and Patio
Forced Air Heat and Air conditioning
Convenient walking distance to Downtown Farmington – weekly concerts and farmers market in season
Convenient 3-5 minute access to M5, I696, I275, and I96
